topics.title: H-Bridge Circuit Schematic
topics.description: The speaker shares the schematic for the H-Bridge circuit, showing its components and layout.
evidence_quotes: Here's my schematic for the H-Bridge I demonstrated at the beginning of the video

topics.title: Improved H-Bridge Motor Control
topics.description: The speaker presents an improved version of a previously published H-Bridge motor control circuit, highlighting its enhancements.
evidence_quotes: I'll discuss briefly what the improvements are

topics.title: MOSFET Selection
topics.description: The speaker discusses the selection of MOSFETs used in the H-Bridge circuit, highlighting their specific characteristics.
evidence_quotes: U1 and U3 are P-channel MOSFETs I used at IRF4905
